definition: deficiency/deficit/luckily/it's lucky that.../(often ironically) fancy that...
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The company has sold off a number of loss-making operations and found ways of amalgamating smaller plants.
sentences.chinese: 企業賣掉了虧本的生產線，試圖尋求合併小企業。

sentences.english: "To break even" means to neither lose nor gain money.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那既不賺錢，也不虧本。

sentences.english: Their company suffered loss on loss in business last year.
sentences.chinese: 他們公司去年在生意上接二連三地虧本。

sentences.english: Sometimes Mr. Smith makes a lot of money when he plays the market, and sometimes he loses.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生做股票生意有時候賺大錢，有時候虧本。

sentences.english: Recent homebuyers would also find themselves out of pocket.
sentences.chinese: 最近的買房者也會覺得自己做了虧本生意。

sentences.english: The successful real estate investor can easily lose her money opening a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 一個成功的房地產投資商很可能因爲開餐館而虧本。

sentences.english: Sometimes I sold my signs at a loss. I did not make money on my product.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我虧本賣出廣告牌，在產品上沒賺到錢。

sentences.english: Although know this is a losing proposition, ziheng decided to help pass.
sentences.chinese: 雖然知道這是虧本生意，子恆還是決定幫助關海。

sentences.english: Most analysts think that the firm loses money on the hardware that it sells.
sentences.chinese: 多數分析師認爲亞馬遜的硬件銷售是虧本經營。

sentences.english: An insider at Zotye Auto said the vehicle is selling at a loss at present.
sentences.chinese: 一名衆泰汽車的內部人員稱此車目前正在虧本銷售。

sentences.english: He has to sell his house at a sacrifice in order to pay his gambling debts.
sentences.chinese: 爲了償付賭債，他只好虧本出賣自己的房子。

sentences.english: He selled the shop at a loss.
It is possible to work out whether you will save or lose money by increasing the temperature by 10C.
sentences.chinese: 計算機可以計算出溫度增加一度你會賺錢還是虧本。

sentences.english: They lost money because of an uneconomic production process.
sentences.chinese: 他們採用不經濟的生產程序導致虧本。

sentences.english: The cost of roasting turkeys doesn't tend to follow actual wholesale prices but is often a loss leader.
sentences.chinese: 烤火雞的費用並不跟隨實際的批發價格走還經常虧本。

sentences.english: Manufacturer reported facing financial difficulty and dumping stock product unbind sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 據報道製造商財政困難，故不惜虧本拋售庫存。

definition: to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); completely deserted
